original_text: Thou shalt not oppress an hired servant that is poor and needy, whether he be of thy brethren, or of thy strangers that are in thy land within thy gates:
korean_text: 곤궁하고 빈한한 품꾼은 너희 형제든지 네 땅 성문 안에 우거하는 객이든지 그를 학대하지 말며

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt not oppress an hired servant
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 고용된 종을 억압해서는 안 되며

sentences.original_text: whether he be of thy brethren
that are in thy land within thy gates:
